name: Monster Run (itch)
description:
An addictive retro pixel-art game with simple but challenging gameplay.

[Prologue]

This story is not about the Hero, it is about Monsters. They were trapped by scientists and locked inside the laboratory. Night by night they were studied and exposed to evil experiments. But one day they have escaped and now are looking for the way to return home. YOU will be the one who will help them to find the way home.

[Gameplay]

Are you ready to test your platforming skills against the ultimate challenge? Do you want to have fun all while improving your dexterity? Jump over the obstacles, change Gravity to reach the edge, Blink through the platforms with just one single tap. It is deceivingly simple. Engage yourself in a battle against your wits all while trying to improve your skills and take them to the next level! Guide your monsters over the obstacles and on platforms to get to the portal and complete the level. Collect gems and gather rewards to unlock more and more monsters. Remember to be careful, one mistake will lead to the instant death and a respawn at the beginning of the level.

[Features]

  • Exciting and addictive gameplay
  • Detailed tutorial
  • A total 180 unique levels spread on 3 Mysterious worlds
  • 7 adorable characters to choose from (Slime, Bookface, Zombie, Ghost, Skeleton, Brain, Fishman)
  • Each character has a special ability
  • 4 different control types (jump, double jump, gravity, blink)
  • Lovely crafted high-quality pixel arts
  • Fantastic 8-bit soundtracks
  • Glorious sound effects
  • A chance to win additional coins or unlock characters with "Fortune Wheel" feature
  • Over 20 achievements to unlock

    • Don't hesitate to test yourself and improve your reaction time. Monster Run is waiting, are you up for the tasks ahead? Download the game now to find out!
